title: Katharine McPhee dresses for autumn in brown tartan at Kate Somerville Clinic anniversary party
text:
Katharine McPhee recently enjoyed an envy-inducing trip to the Maldives with husband David Foster.

But now that she's returned stateside, the American Idol alum seems to be ready for cooler temperatures.

McPhee dressed for autumn Thursday as she arrived at Kate Somerville Clinic's 15th anniversary party in Los Angeles.

Autumn chic: Katharine McPhee dressed for autumn Thursday as she arrived at Kate Somerville Clinic's 15th anniversary party in Los Angeles

She cut a chic east coast look in a ribbed brick red tank top with a tan suede mini skirt.

The 35-year-old covered up with a brown tartan double-breasted blazer draped over her shoulders.

She completed the look with some gold necklaces and a pair of brown open-toe suede stilettos with tied ankle straps.

McPhee carried a scarlet leather handbag with a braided chain strap over her shoulder.

Tan suede: She cut a chic east coast look in a ribbed brick red tank top with a tan suede mini skirt

Brown tartan: The 35-year-old covered up with a brown tartan double-breasted blazer draped over her shoulders

Accessorizing: She completed the look with some gold necklaces and a pair of brown open-toe suede stilettos with tied ankle straps. McPhee carried a scarlet leather handbag with a braided chain strap over her shoulder

Woman of the hour: She posed at the event with Kate Somerville, founder of the renowned Hollywood skin clinic

She posed at the event with Kate Somerville, founder of the renowned Hollywood skin clinic.

McPhee and Foster, 69, recently returned from the Maldives, where they posted some stunning photos.

The Smash star and her new husband enjoyed a bike ride through the gorgeous island.

Romantic getaway: McPhee and Foster, 69, recently returned from the Maldives, where they posted some stunning photos

Biker chick: The Smash star and her new husband enjoyed a bike ride through the gorgeous island

Bikini bod: She also posed in in a bikini as she sat on a palm street against the crystal clear blue waters

She also posed in in a bikini as she sat on a palm street against the crystal clear blue waters.

McPhee posted a mirror selfie, with the caption: 'David posted this while playing games on my phone. Not sure why or how he chose it but I’m not complaining.'

She tagged Kim Kardashian West, as the post was a nod to a 2015 tweet, in which she claimed North posted her bikini shot to Instagram.

MIrror selfie: McPhee posted a mirror selfie, with the caption: 'David posted this while playing games on my phone. Not sure why or how he chose it but I’m not complaining'
description: McPhee and Foster recently returned from the Maldives, where they posted some stunning photos. One bikini mirror selfie was a nod to a 2015 tweet by Kim Kardashian West.
